      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addItem(MenuItem orderedItem, int quantity)
      Mutator of the Order object's items Adds a key value pair combination to the order
      void calculateTotalPrices()
      Calculate original and actual total price Original price is sum of actual price of each order item which is (order item price * quantity) Actual price is addition of service charge and GST to original price with discount given according to membership tier of customer

      Get the information of the staff that created the order

      Get the table number of this order
      void printOrderInvoice()
      Display Order invoice Displayed information includes order ID, table number, date/time of order, staff details, list of ordered items, subtotal, service charge, gst, discount granted and nett total

      Mutator of Order object's items Removes the specified item from the map

    • Constructor Detail

      • Order

        public Order(int orderId,
             int tableNumber,
             Staff CreatedBy,
             java.util.Calendar OrderDateTime,
             Discount.discountType discount)
        Constructor of Order object Creates a new order with the given information
        Parameters:
        orderId - is the order ID of the order
        tableNumber - is the table number of the order
        CreatedBy - is the staff that took the order
        OrderDateTime - is the date/time when order was made
        discount - is the membership tier of the customer

        Parameters:

      • calculateTotalPrices

        public void calculateTotalPrices()
        Calculate original and actual total price Original price is sum of actual price of each order item which is (order item price * quantity) Actual price is addition of service charge and GST to original price with discount given according to membership tier of customer
